title: Cloud like lather!
body: This bar has the softest most cloud like lather I‚Äôve ever felt from a facial bar! Not a strong scent which I appreciate as someone that gets migraines from strong scents. Left my face feeling nice, clean and soft.

title: Sooooo Good! Soothing, non drying and a joy to use.
body:
Of all of the products l have tried by this company, this is hands down my favorite. I primarily use this as a facial cleanser, but you can use this on your body as well. I was a bit skeptical to use a bar cleanser, but that changed as soon as l used it. I have dry sensitive skin so wasn't expecting much, but l'm so happy l found this. It gives a lovely soft leather, feels great on
the skin, leaves your skin clean and soft, with no tightness. I'd much rather use this than the expensive Estee Lauder gel cleanser l was using before. Not only does this do a better job, but it is a fractions of the price.
My Husband even tried it and now using it as well. I will definitely keep purchasing this.

title: Smells Good and Quality Looks Good/UPDATE ON SKIN
body:
This is my first time trying this Rice Bar Soap, so I‚Äôm giving you a update on how my Skin Reacts to it.. I hope from this my Skin glows and hydrates.. As of now, packing is lovely and the Bar feels so smooth which I like. It‚Äôs unscented which is a plus it does not smell like strong fragrances because this imply this product is. Natural and not so harsh on Skin.. AS OF NOW I like it and will give out Update Size it‚Äôs pretty Small on my opinion but I‚Äôm planning to use it on my Skin only so I don‚Äôt mind.

Update:This has been the third day, I have been using the Rice Bar on my Skin. Day and Night.. let me tell you this makes your SKIN SO SOFT! And it gives you a natural Glow!!!! Not too Greasy glow just the one that makes you look like a natural soft Glow!! My Skin did not irritate at all no matter how many times of I applied this soap on my Face.. This is perfect if you are struggling with Sensitive Skin.. ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: All around good product
body:
The good points with this soap: it has a gentle exfoliating feel, it feels good on my skin while using it.

What could be better: it doesn‚Äôt last very long, I‚Äôve only used it about three times and it‚Äôs already quite small now. And it does leave kind of a ‚Äúgrippy‚Äù feel after rinsing which I don‚Äôt like in soaps.

title: Yes
body: This is good stuff thank you .

title: Surprisingly Gentle
body: I have sensitive, reactive, dehydrated and normal to dry skin. I easily break out when my skin is overstripped or the barrier is compromised in any way. For years I have been unable to use any cleanser that is foaming or sudsing in any way and have had to use only lotion type cleansers. I thought I would try this as I love other products from this line and the price was very reasonable. I am so surprised to say that I have been able to use this twice a day for so long that I went through an entire bar and bought two more! It foams nicely, and I have missed being able to use a foamy cleanser. The lather/foam it creates is thick and sift, and while it does leave my face a bit dry and tight, it has caused zero irritation or compromise to my skin barrier. I always follow with toners, essences, serums, and moisturizers regardless of my cleanser, so the initial tightness is not bothersome. While it does dry a bit, it doesn‚Äôt seem to actually dehydrate my skin. Best of all, it keeps my skin clear and bright better than almost any cleanser I have ever used. I am so shocked by this bar, not at all what I expect from this type of soap. So pleased!!

title: Fantastic soap.
body:
This soap is the best I have ever used. Turns out, some manufacturers of other soaps use chemicals that damage and harm your skin even if the soap is meant to aid your skin against dryness, seborrhea, psoriasis, eczema, etc.

This is perhaps the best soap I have ever used in my life. The rest of Western soaps can burn in h*** for all I care.

title: Great cleanser
body: I love how easily it foams and gets my skin really clean without drying.

title: It‚Äôs okay
body: I have dry skin and hormonal acne (it‚Äôs not bad but I have a little on my body) and I didn‚Äôt notice this being a miracle product by any means. But it did leave my skin a little bit softer when I did use it (I will also note that sometimes I would get itchy in areas I used it though)! It seemed to unclog some of the pores on my chest too. I probably wouldn‚Äôt repurchase but it may work better for others. It‚Äôs unscented as well so that‚Äôs a plus.

title: Soft skin
body:
I am not a soap peoson for my skin, but have liked other products from this brand. Figuring this would be good to keep in the shower.
After a particularly hot and humid day I grabbed it to wash off my face and neck. It left my skin so soft and protected without additional moisturizer!
Also the bar is on the small size, highly recommend

title: Great cleaser!

My nose and cheeks get very oily throughout the day and is where I get the most acne due to dirt/impurities. By day 3 my skin is much cleaner. 10/10 recommend

title: Best beauty bar
body: BOJ is a budget conscious effective Korean skincare line. When I started my skincare journey at the age of 13, I was introduced to a facial cleansing bar. To this day, I like bar soap, minus the cons of soap. This beauty bar is the perfect solution. It is a hydrating exfoliating bar that does not strip the skin or contain any of the bad ingredients associated with bar soap. It cleanses, exfoliates (it contains rice husks for gentle exfoliation), firms & leaves the skin feeling comfortable & supple. If you like a bar soap formulation but with all of goodness K-beauty has to offer; this is your dream beauty bar.
